and c.clase_name like concat('%',#{claseName},'%')
and m.major_name like concat('%',#{majorName},'%')

select c.clase_id as claseId, c.clase_name as claseName, c.major_id as majorId, c.teacher_id as teacherId, t.name as headmasterName, t.phone as headmasterPhone, m.major_name as majorName from clase c left join teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id left join major m on c.major_id = m.major_id where c.clase_id = #{claseId} and c.is_del = true
